description: This file defines a React functional component named `ConfluencePanel`, which manages the UI and logic for connecting to Confluence, handling authentication via OAuth or API Token, and displaying Confluence spaces and content. It interacts with various contexts (`AuthContext`, `AppContext`) and components to facilitate user interaction for Confluence integration.

methods.name: ConfluencePanel
methods.description: Main React component managing Confluence integration UI, authentication, and space/content display.

methods.name: handleAuthSuccess
methods.description: Handles successful authentication, triggering loading of Confluence spaces.

methods.name: handleAuthError
methods.description: Handles authentication errors and displays notifications.

methods.name: handleDisconnect
methods.description: Logs out the user from Confluence, resets data, and UI state.

methods.name: handleSpaceSelect
methods.description: Sets selected space and loads its content.

methods.name: handleBackToSpaces
methods.description: Returns UI to the list of spaces from content view.
